title: Why are kids better at using technology than most old people? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kids brain are fresh. They're still in learning process. And it is easy for them to grasp and understand, be it old or new technology. On the other hand old people will be used to a particular method. To teach them something new is difficult because of the age. Their memory will be deteriorating and they will forget things quickly.

Because young people have had it since they were much younger and when you are younger your brain is more prepare to learn new concepts and ideas, while older people have a harder time because the older you get the harder it is to understand new things and become good at it.
